name: 吳舜堂
objective:
This course aims at developing comprehension of derivation and integral、activating capabilities of logic inference and induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content of Calculus(I)
includes: 1.Functions and Limits, 2.Derivatives, 3.Inverse Functions (includes 
Transcendental Functions), 4.Applications of Differentiation, 5.Integrals,
6.Techniques of Integration.
schedule:
Week 1~ 3 : Chapter 1 : Functions and Limits 
Week 4~ 6 : Chapter 2 : Derivatives
Week 7~ 9 : Chapter 3 : Inverse Functions, Midterm Exam.
Week10~ 12: Chapter 4 : Applications of Differentiation
Week13~14 : Chapter 5 : Integrals
Week15~17 : Chapter 6 : Techniques of Integration
Week 18 : Final Exam.
scorePolicy:
1. 1. Attendance:10%
2. Homework:10%
3. Two Quiz： 30%
2. Midterm Exam.：25%
5.Final Exam.： 25%
